entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ❓ Survey: Repo contribution experience 2022 #64649
  • StreamPipeWriter doesn't dispose the inner stream on complete if flush fails #64639
  • FileStream leaks enormous amount of memory #64632
  • Native aot'ed shared libraries should not be unloadable on unix #64629
  • FileStream.Lock() differs in behaviour between Windows and Linux using .NET 6.0 #64634
  • [API Proposal]: Console: .ReadBool, .ReadInt, .ReadLong and so on #64621
  • Connecting a Blazor Client app to an Azure Service Bus? #64620
  • Assemblies compiled in 6.0 and main contain an incorrect TargetPlatformAttribute in their metadata #64616
  • JIT: Fold constant access to RVA #64613
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: _umul128 arm64 intrinsic support #64609
  • Generated XmlSerializers DLL (from Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator) cause FileNotFoundException when used in COM host #64608
  • Regressions in System.Xml.Linq.Perf_XName (FullPGO) #64626
  • Cannot use file stream for [*.deps.json]: No such file or directory #64606
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #64622
  • Ensure we set -ffp-contract=off on GCC #64604
  • System.Runtime work planned for .NET 7 #64603
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml work planned for .NET 7 #64602
    7.0.0
  • System.Linq work planned for .NET 7 #64601
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process work planned for .NET 7 #64600
    7.0.0
  • System.Collections work planned for .NET 7 #64599
    7.0.0
  • System.Buffers work planned for .NET 7 #64598
    7.0.0
  • System.IO work planned for .NET 7 #64596
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: remove dependency on System.Drawing.Common from System.Runtime.Caching #64592
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests randomly fail with `The tasks argument included a null value. (Parameter 'tasks')` #64588
    7.0.0
  • jitstress test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256/Vector256_ro/Vector256_ro.sh throws an exception #64587
  • DllImportGenerator.UnitTests failure: The type or namespace name 'DllImportAttribute' could not be found #64586
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` failing #64585

Closed

  • [wasm][windows][aot] `emcc` fails to download `zlib` on rolling build, causing tests to fail #62553
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 failing at Decompress large gzip text #64577
  • Requested optimization when two registered services refer to the same target type #64351
  • Improve HostBuilder and WebApplicationBuilder ServiceCollection integration #61635
    7.0.0
  • Composite CG2 systemically fails to resolve certain generic instantiations #64170
    7.0.0
  • Supporting netstandard2.x platform specific target frameworks is causing unreasonable pain #64536
    7.0.0
  • AllowRenegotiation is ignored on Linux #63699
    7.0.0
  • GZipStream calling Flush before Dispose cause in more data being written when compressing #64590
  • PipeWriterStream.DisposeAsync should call CompleteAsync on the underlying pipe writer #64326
  • MonoTests.System.Drawing.TestBitmap fail on Linux arm on checked coreclr #37082
    Future
  • Seg fault in System.Drawing.Common tests on Unix #23784
    Future
  • Arm64: Prefer fmul and fadd/fsub to fmadd/fnmsub #64591
  • Consider reducing HeaderDescriptor size by using object field #62847
    Future
  • Fix Behavior Differences in Unix System.Drawing.Common #22221
    Future
  • TryConvertIanaIdToWindowsId empy output on server #64526
    Future
  • WritableBitmap is not updating after updating the BackBuffer #64605
  • SuperPMI collect of benchmarks fails with "UnicodeEncodeError: 'charmap' codec can't encode character '\ufffd' in position 670361" #64575
    7.0.0
  • Should new APIs added to System.IO be excluded from MS.IO.Redist? #54919
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable Vector256 tests which are timing out #64653
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some flaky tests #64652
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ignore exit code returned from the merged wrappers #64651
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #64644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add tests for overlap and non-aligned ref fields. #64643
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Pass IV through cipher resets for OpenSSL and Android #64641
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Add an 'allow-loader-errors' AOT option. #64640
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector.Equals #64638
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] [AOT] Use `.short` directive instead of `.hword` #64637
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.3
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Handle ((IAsyncResult)task).AsyncWaitHandle.Dispose better in task completion #64627
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Throw PNSE if insufficient privileges when custom Ping payload was specified #64625
    area-System.Net
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Sum/Average/Max/Min for arrays and lists #64624
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Fix Issue 62756 Some outer loop tests on Linux fail unless run as root #64619
    community-contribution
  • [mono] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_U opcode #64618
    community-contribution
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64593
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm] Enable WasmTemplateTests on CI #64589
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • With `build -subset help` output "macro" subset components #64578
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Remove USE_ZLIB=1 on windows, as we are already including the … #64628
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix generic method resolution in composite R2R images #64247
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete NS2x runtime specific impls #64610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add incremental build instructions when ... #64396
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable some PerformanceCounter tests on more platforms #64633
  • Roll out board automation for Jeremy & Levi #64617
    area-Meta
  • Minor cleanup for CryptoServiceProviders #64560
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use latest System.Memory.Data baseline version #64630
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix client-initiated renegotiation on OpenSSL 3.0+ #64531
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [AOT] Use `.short` directive instead of `.hword` #64561
    community-contribution
  • Update ComputeHash to remove hash allocations for digest authentication #64005
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Port vs4 mac fixes #64583
    area-System.IO
  • Update area-owners verbiage about FabricBot configuration for notifications #64595
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Implement operator delete on ThreadStressLog #64478
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoid CreateThreadStressLog under SpinLock #64421
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Override DisposeAsync in PipeWriterStream #64547
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Remove an allocation importing symmetric keys #64584
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Reduce the size of HeaderDescriptor #64105
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix LLC cache issue on Apple M1 #64576
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Set language specific flags appropriately in mono #64454
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Do not add NRE sets for non-null addresses #64607
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move FabricBot generation scripts to dotnet/runtime #64324
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Set wasm debugger log level at execution time. #64339
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix several remaining IL tests I missed in my assembly name cleanup #64555
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add NetCoreAppCurrent rid agnostic tfm to libs #64518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • superpmi: Catch errors while printing the unicode string #64597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAot: Allow disabling -pie flag #64580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use hash size constants where applicable #64218
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Revert "Disable InspectVariableBeforeAndAfterAssignment test (#64546)" #64574
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add per-test ids, and save logs to files for the test, and proxy messages #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add alignment to mapped field stream #64559
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Metadata, 6.0.3
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Local heap optimizations on Arm64 #64481
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Increase default HostOptions.ShutdownTimeout value to 30 seconds #63712
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • mono_get_generic_info_from_stack_frame fix for default interface methods #64566
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix debugger initialization #64523
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Delete custom cmake config cache mechanism on Unix #64370
    community-contribution
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Allow use of overloaded methods when using LoggerMessage #64573
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix DateOnly and TimeOnly Formatting using interpolated strings #64460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix downcast check in Array.CopySlow #64479
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix Xamarin assembly names in HttpClientHandler #64391
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-ios, 6.0.3
  • [wasm] Emscripten 2.0.34 bump #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/include/mono-2.0 #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Serialize SendPacketsAsync tests #63888
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test bug
  • [release/6.0] Fix OpenSSL version check in GetAlpnSupport #64032
    area-System.Net.Security, test bug
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Import string.Empty as "" #64530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64200
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Remove unused variable, fix typos #64542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Fix DNS cancellation deadlock #63904
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update mac Helix queues #64565
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over minimal code from Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • fix some test for FreeBSD #64426
    area-System.Net, os-freebsd, 7.0.0
  • Optimize the remaining awaitable types in S.P.C. #64564
    community-contribution
  • Proposed changes to ECMA 335 for ref field support #63659
    area-Meta
  • NativeAOT ARM64 libraries testing #64373
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
